title: Amazon BSR Explained - What Is Best Seller Rank?

tactics.name: BSR Analysis with Tools
tactics.description: Use Amazon's Best Seller Rank and third-party tools to evaluate product performance and sales estimates.
steps: Use Amazon DS Quick View plugin to view BSR on product pages
Input BSR and category into Jungle Scout for sales estimation
caveats: BSR is fluid and changes hourly
Does not reflect real-time sales velocity
source_quotes: the lower the number the more it's selling in general

tactics.name: BSR Sales Estimation
tactics.description: Use Best Seller Rank to estimate monthly sales by dividing units sold by 30 days
source_quotes: we're going to hit calculate sales and it'll tell us how many units approximately per month that this is selling

heuristics.name: BSR Threshold Boost
heuristics.condition: If BSR is below 50,000, prioritize product
source_quotes: the lower the number the better

heuristics.name: Consistency Check
heuristics.condition: If BSR fluctuates widely over time
source_quotes: we can look at the data tab we can look at the product details and we can see the sales rank

claims.statement: Amazon Best Seller Rank is calculated based on sales data and updates hourly.
source_quotes: the calculation is based on amazon sales and is updated hourly

claims.statement: BSR can predict sales performance across platforms
source_quotes: you can use the best seller ranking as a really good gauge on how well that it's going to sell

niche_patterns.description: Identify niches with high BSR in specific categories for competitive advantage
niche_patterns.why_it_works: High BSR indicates established demand, while niche specificity reduces competition
source_quotes: you want to look at the top level category

niche_patterns.description: Identify underserved niches with low competition
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Low review counts indicate untapped market potential
source_quotes: when it comes to like print on demand products
